recommended_degree: Teknik informatika, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem informasi, Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak, Teknologi Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
UI/UX Designer (experienced):
•  Assist the HPIT team in conducting basic user research and transforming insights into user flows or problem statements.
•  Help create wireframes and interactive prototypes in Figma according to feature requirements planned by HPIT.
•  Assist in producing clean and consistent UI designs that follow HPIT’s existing design system.
•  Help conduct simple usability testing and document improvement recommendations based on user feedback.
•  Support collaboration with developers and the HPIT Product Owner to ensure designs are implemented according to specifications.
